message: Bob, I'm excited to offer you a chance to own this incredible product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $1,500,000.  I'm open to discussing this further, of course.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I am only able to offer $1,200,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but it's a bit below what I had in mind.  How about we meet in the middle at $1,350,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I'm willing to increase my offer to $1,300,000. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.
